channel.title: Devion's Realm [PI] - Rework
channel.description:
restarting for the 3rd time on this project because the last one failed...again =D
[b]base:[/b] Exion's PI base V1 [b]protocol:[/b] 317
i will attempt to make it be generally PVM but there will be some PVP in it ( wildy , PKP , safe PK , etc... ) [center][b]----- Update Log -----[/b] [b]red[/b] = not started [b]orange[/b] = working on it [b]green[/b] = finished
Fix Zamorak GWD Rework GWD itself : only the bosses themselves will be at the troll arena Add Giant Mole add Kalphite Queen :
-added 1st and 2nd form -added all attack styles and emotes -fix respawning time
Make a safe PK zone Add PK points and PKP shop Add Vengeance Fix runecrafting ( areas ) Fix agility Fix firemaking change home add the new hp bars and hitsplashes add boss points and boss points shop add Divine Spirit Shield and it's Special Effect add Elysian Spirit Shield + special effect [b]Media[/b] [url=http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=4XzcmqBenpQ]New HP bars and Hitmarks[/url] [url=http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=T80qX6ctJSo]Zamorak Godwars[/url]
[/center]

item.title: Devion's Realm [PI] - Rework
item.dc:creator: @Cres Cres
item.description:
@Cres wrote:

restarting for the 3rd time on this project because the last one failed…again =D

base: Exion’s PI base V1
protocol: 317

i will attempt to make it be generally PVM but there will be some PVP in it ( wildy , PKP , safe PK , etc… )
[center]----- Update Log -----
red = not started
orange = working on it
green = finished

Fix Zamorak GWD
Rework GWD itself : only the bosses themselves will be at the troll arena
Add Giant Mole
add Kalphite Queen :

-added 1st and 2nd form
-added all attack styles and emotes
-fix respawning time

Make a safe PK zone
Add PK points and PKP shop
Add Vengeance
Fix runecrafting ( areas )
Fix agility
Fix firemaking
change home
add the new hp bars and hitsplashes
add boss points and boss points shop
add Divine Spirit Shield and it’s Special Effect
add Elysian Spirit Shield + special effect
Media
New HP bars and Hitmarks
Zamorak Godwars

[/center]
